name: Shadow Redux Demo
description:
Welcome to Shadow Redux, where you play a thief who can teleport by using his shadow. You use this power to sneak into secure areas, avoid traps/enemies, and steal valuable items. As stealth was the main focus during the development process, there is currently no combat system implemented, but there are plans for that and other features. 

Shadow Redux is the result of a school project. This demo is a look into what one of the levels of the full game could look like, with the main shadow power implemented. Any feedback is appreciated.
